website_summaries.verdict: This countersink drill bit set works great for drilling into wood, metal, and other materials.
pros: Constructed from M2 materials that guarantee the set can serve you well for lots of use
Drill bits are equipped with a 5-flute design to limit vibration when in use
Sold with a handy carrying case that makes it simple to take the drill bits with you on the go
cons: Drill bits are very dull and sometimes fail to deliver a clean, precise cut

customer_reviews.title: Just an OK countersink set for DIY
customer_reviews.text: An OK countersink. I have used a couple of these countersinks on soft wood and it always left a semi-rough finish. I tried moderating the feed speed and got the same result. Part of the reason for the rough finish is that they are not true (wobbles a bit on drill press). I purchased this set based on user reviews and price. I didn't return them because they are OK for my "once in a while" use of the item for DIY house projects. If you desire or expect a better countersink finish, I would suggest buying a different set.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: These countersinks arrived dull. I didn't return them but I can't recommend ...
customer_reviews.text: These countersinks arrived dull. I didn't return them but I can't recommend them either. I used the 2 largest ones to chamfer some #8 screw holes in 6061 and ended up having to touch up the edges and slow them down to a crawl to get a clean cut. I will try the single flute next time and buy a countersink made by a real tool maker. I imagine these will work for wood ok but for 6061 they didn't do a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Richard V. Lando II

customer_reviews.title: Chatters like crazy
customer_reviews.text: I tried all of the cutters on different materials at different speeds, and all they did was chatter. Could not get a clean cut on anything. I am a 42 year journeyman tool and die maker, I know how to use cutters. These don't cut it. Sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: MEH
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice case Cons:Wobbles in drill press Not very sharp <in soft pine> Rough cut
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: Reloading Problem Solved
customer_reviews.text: The largest two sizes work good eliminating (countersinking) primer pocket crimps on 5.56/.233 brass for reloading even though they are listed for use with wood. The relatively soft metal of brass does not damage these Neiko bits. It makes brass compatible with the RCBS hand priming tool using CCI pre-filled small-rifle APS primer strips (No. 400). Case is pretty nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. L.

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well On Aluminum Plate
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for counter sinking aluminum foot plates for a pair of roller skates. The size selection was nice and I was able to counter sink 12 holes in pretty short order. The bit doesn't look any worse for wear and I can barely tell it had been used. I haven't tried these on wood or anything else. But it did aluminum well.
customer_reviews.author: ATT

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Good kit for the price. All bits seem to be sharp. Bit seem to be a little off balance and not true in shape. After Drilling with countersink bits the whole does not seem to be very uniform and smooth but more dis formed
customer_reviews.author: TeamZ

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: They will probably do the job, they do not look very well-made. It would be unfair to evaluate them for their longevity, as I have not had them for a long time. They were loose in their little box, and quite a few chips on them from hitting one another, on the way. Spend a bit more money and buy a better known brand.
customer_reviews.author: maisonlumier

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: OK for simple projects. The bits can leave somewhat jagged edges when countersinking.
customer_reviews.author: El Guapo

customer_reviews.title: Burned after just a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Used in a cordless drill into plywood. Got about 10 holes done before all it does is light the wood on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FRAUDULENT PICTURES
customer_reviews.text: Tools I received not as pictured. Pictured tool was gold noting titanium coating and HSS marks on shank not what I received, fraud !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: EvaCherry

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't use them in a drill press (wobble) On a more mundane complaint, the case doesn't have a clasp and the foam is ill fitting.
customer_reviews.author: William L. King

customer_reviews.title: These perform great and I think they will be very useful for ...
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint was that the interior foam material stuck to the bit when I first took them out but it didn't effect performance at all. These perform great and I think they will be very useful for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: MDutton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Can't verity the longevity yet, but very pleased with this item. Love the "pick a size" 5-piece set.
customer_reviews.author: Rough Rider

customer_reviews.title: Nice item.
customer_reviews.text: Now I can stop using regular drill bits for setting screws while woodworking.
customer_reviews.author: Roy  Moulesong

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and Does the Trick
customer_reviews.text: Rating categories such as "sheerness" and "thickness" do not really apply top these
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value and quality. Surprising beautiful fitted aluminum case. I'd buy again
customer_reviews.author: betty times 5

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use these on a daily basis but so far they work great. Before these I had some Ryobi countersinks and I prefer Neiko’s. I have a few products from the same manufacturer and they have all been better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: These bits certainly do their job on the plywood I’m using. They rumble a bit and the case is very poor quality, but for the price, they are nice. I couldn’t afford a proper drill countersink, and these do well.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: nice set
customer_reviews.text: seems to be of good quality - sharp to begin with - well finished - if they last a while they will be a fantastic tool for the price
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: They do what they’re made to do.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I’m just a diyer so I don’t use these all the time, but they work when it do. Good quality as well
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: The carrying case is very handy and keeps them organized.
customer_reviews.text: The bits seem to stay sharp. I use them probably once a week on building projects. I would have preferred a hex shank to go in my impact driver. However, they work well enough in my drill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: I use them to clean the burs from drilling in metal, have had no issues with them
customer_reviews.author: M. Miedema

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT I EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a 5 point counter sink this is exactly what you want. I prefer a round counter sunk hole lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bits - Great Case
customer_reviews.text: I used the bits today and they worked great. I really appreciate the case they came it. It keeps the bits together and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bugbee

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Well built. I've used them several times since purchased. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: DavidM

customer_reviews.title: Great value product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the cost. Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They seem to do a fine job. So far I have used them in ...
customer_reviews.text: They seem to do a fine job. So far I have used them in oak and aluminum and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Baker

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy countersink drill bits
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, if you are looking for sturdy countersink drill bits, look no further. This also comes with a small carying case which helps keep things organized.
customer_reviews.author: Nima M.

customer_reviews.title: Cutting Flutes Damaged and Countersinks don't fit in foam
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for... I'm surprised this listing has over 4 stars. I would write this a 2 or 3 star but I feel like I need to pull the overall rating down more.
customer_reviews.author: Soroosh H.

customer_reviews.title: I have no tearing issues like some other users
customer_reviews.text: I have only used on hardwood at 500rpm. I have no tearing issues like some other users. The fact that they come in a very nice case, is another plus.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Chippy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price and the quality is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jack of some trades (or something)

customer_reviews.title: Good for very light use
customer_reviews.text: I used on hardwood and MDF but they get dull quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied !
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes creates a star pattern in soft wood, could be user error. For price and durabilty I recommend these. Decent little storage box also
customer_reviews.author: Josh Shryock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Real sharp careful on your first use .. defiantly quality product
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: I like these countersinks because
customer_reviews.text: I like these countersinks because; 1) They are stored in a nice sturdy case. 2) They work as well as another brand I have that I paid twice the amount for one bit! 3) Delivered in 2-days! 4) A nice clean cut for the countersink. These are a must for any toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: jrvtgs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work great. I am a machinist and I use them to debur aluminum and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly without issue. Bits come in a nice case for clean storage in shop drawers. Work great
customer_reviews.author: DEREK C GIBBS

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I guess these are good, I've never had other ones before.
customer_reviews.author: Mehr

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice chatter-free countersinks in pine, oak and maple. Drill the countersink first and then drill the hole in the canter.

customer_reviews.title: love these. the case is kinda cheap ish
customer_reviews.text: love these. the case is kinda cheap ish, but works well enough and does the job. i dig

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice bits for around the house not for commerical work

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven't tried it as yet, it does look very well made.

customer_reviews.title: the recipient was very pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a gift, the recipient was very pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: 09RT

customer_reviews.title: The bits come with a nice case to help keep track of them so they ...
customer_reviews.text: The bits come with a nice case to help keep track of them so they ready to go when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Why buy
customer_reviews.text: Works just like I expected. I look forward to counter sinking.
customer_reviews.author: Norm the Nonfiction Reader

product_meta.title: Neiko 10218A Countersink Drill Bit Set, M2 High Speed Steel, 1/4” Tri-Flat Shank | 1/4”-3/4”, 5 Piece Set with Carrying Case
product_meta.description: 5pc Heavy Duty Industrial Grade NEIKO Countersink Drill BIT Tool SET Woodworking Professional Tools, Cut Quickly and Easily in Soft Metal, Wood, Rubber, Plastic and Other Machin able Materials.
feature_bullets: Set of five 1/4" countersink drill bits with precision-ground 82-degree tips for drilling into wood, soft metals, rubber, plastic, and more
Made of high quality M2 material construction for extended bit life and 1/4" shank fits common handheld power drill
Five-flute design reduces vibration for smoother drilling and tri-flat shank allows easy gripping
Set contains 1/4", 3/8", 1/2", 5/8", and 3/4" countersink drill bits that are very commonly used
Sturdy aluminum case with handle included for carrying and storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars195 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
